txt.en: 'I fear many strong enemies gather all around us. I must scout the encampment west of here. Would you divert the eyes of the Enemy in the Slag-hills while I learn more about the encampment to the east?\n\n'We shall meet here afterwards and I will share with you what knowledge I have gained.'
Candúr has asked you to gauge the enemy presence in the Slag-hills before dealing with any other nearby threats.
Many foes can be found in and around the Slag-hills.\n\nYou should defeat foes within the Slag-hills.

'The gap in the hills east of here is known as Lang Rhuven. The entire pass is now blockaded and controlled by the Easterlings. Many Easterlings gather there and continue to come through the pass to the east that eventually heads towards Rhûn.\n\n'I hope that you will be able to call upon your allies as they will be needed to thwart the encampment at Lang Rhuven.'
You should return to Candúr, who can be found at a small Ranger outpost hidden in the Slag-hills.
